Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,175 @@ +// src/components/splash.js +export const splashContent = ` +
+
+
+
+
+ +
+
+
+ +
+
+
+ +
+
+
+
+

Illuminating Tomorrow's
Energy Solutions

+
+

+ Pioneering excellence in + lighting, + solar, and + transformers + technologies. +

+
+
+
+
+
+ + +
+
+
+ + + + + +
+
+
+
+ + + + + +
+
+
+
+ + + + + +
+
+
+ +
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+`; + +export function initSplash(gsap) { + document.getElementById('splash-content').innerHTML = splashContent; + + // Add namespace class if not present + const splashSection = document.querySelector('.s-splash'); + if (!splashSection.classList.contains('radiant-splash')) { + splashSection.classList.add('radiant-splash'); + } + // Initialize highlight words interaction + const highlightWords = document.querySelectorAll('.highlight-word'); + const imageArrays = { + lighting: document.querySelector('.lighting-array'), + solar: document.querySelector('.solar-array'), + transformers: document.querySelector('.transformers-array') + }; + + // Create hover animations + highlightWords.forEach(word => { + const category = word.dataset.category; + const imageArray = imageArrays[category]; + + // Initial state + gsap.set(imageArray, { autoAlpha: 0 }); + gsap.set(imageArray.querySelectorAll('.array-image'), { + y: 100, + opacity: 0, + rotateX: -30 + }); + + // Hover animations + word.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => { + // Show image array + gsap.to(imageArray, { + autoAlpha: 1, + duration: 0.4 + }); + + // Animate images + gsap.to(imageArray.querySelectorAll('.array-image'), { + y: 0, + opacity: 1, + rotateX: 0, + stagger: 0.1, + duration: 0.8, + ease: "power3.out" + }); + + // Highlight word + gsap.to(word, { + color: "#00e5d2", + duration: 0.3 + }); + }); + + word.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => { + // Hide image array + gsap.to(imageArray, { + autoAlpha: 0, + duration: 0.4 + }); + + // Reset images + gsap.to(imageArray.querySelectorAll('.array-image'), { + y: 100, + opacity: 0, + rotateX: -30, + stagger: 0.05, + duration: 0.4, + ease: "power2.in" + }); + + // Reset word + gsap.to(word, { + color: "white", + duration: 0.3 + }); + }); + }); + + // Initial animations + gsap.from('.huge-text', { + y: 100, + opacity: 0, + duration: 1.2, + ease: "power3.out" + }); + + gsap.from('.interactive-text', { + y: 50, + opacity: 0, + duration: 1, + delay: 0.5, + ease: "power3.out" + }); +} \ No newline at end of file

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,195 @@ +// src/components/splash.js +export const splashContent = ` +
+
+
+
+
+ +
+
+
+ +
+
+
+ +
+
+
+
+

Illuminating Tomorrow's
Energy Solutions

+
+

+ Pioneering excellence in + lighting, + solar, and + transformers + technologies. +

+
+
+
+
+
+ + +
+
+
+ + + + + +
+
+
+
+ + + + + +
+
+
+
+ + + + + +
+
+
+ +
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+`; + +export function initSplash(gsap) { + if (!gsap) { + console.error('GSAP is required for animations'); + return; + } + + document.getElementById('splash-content').innerHTML = splashContent; + + // Initialize highlight words interaction + const highlightWords = document.querySelectorAll('.highlight-word'); + const imageArrays = { + lighting: document.querySelector('.lighting-array'), + solar: document.querySelector('.solar-array'), + transformers: document.querySelector('.transformers-array') + }; + + // Helper function for animations + function animateImages(images, show) { + const tl = gsap.timeline(); + + if (show) { + tl.to(images.parentElement, { + visibility: 'visible', + opacity: 1, + duration: 0.4 + }) + .to(images, { + y: 0, + opacity: 1, + rotateX: 0, + stagger: 0.1, + duration: 0.8, + ease: "power3.out" + }, "-=0.2"); + } else { + tl.to(images, { + y: 100, + opacity: 0, + rotateX: -30, + stagger: 0.05, + duration: 0.4, + ease: "power2.in" + }) + .to(images.parentElement, { + visibility: 'hidden', + opacity: 0, + duration: 0.3 + }, "-=0.2"); + } + + return tl; + } + + // Setup hover interactions + highlightWords.forEach(word => { + const category = word.dataset.category; + const imageArray = imageArrays[category]; + + if (!imageArray) return; + + const images = imageArray.querySelectorAll('.array-image'); + + // Set initial state + gsap.set(images, { + y: 100, + opacity: 0, + rotateX: -30 + }); + + // Hover animations + word.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => { + gsap.to(word, { + color: "#00e5d2", + duration: 0.3 + }); + + animateImages(images, true); + }); + + word.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => { + gsap.to(word, { + color: "white", + duration: 0.3 + }); + + animateImages(images, false); + }); + }); + + // Initial animations + gsap.from('.huge-text', { + y: 100, + opacity: 0, + duration: 1.2, + ease: "power3.out", + scrollTrigger: { + trigger: '.huge-text', + start: 'top center+=100', + toggleActions: 'play none none reverse' + } + }); + + gsap.from('.interactive-text', { + y: 50, + opacity: 0, + duration: 1, + delay: 0.5, + ease: "power3.out", + scrollTrigger: { + trigger: '.interactive-text', + start: 'top center+=150', + toggleActions: 'play none none reverse' + } + }); +} \ No newline at end of file

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,116 @@ +// src/components/splash.js +export const splashContent = ` + + + +
+ + +
+
+
+
+ +

Illuminating Tomorrow's
Energy Solutions

+ +
+ +

+ Pioneering excellence in  + +

+ lighting +
+ +
+ +

+ `; + +export function initSplash() { + // Insert content + const splashContainer = document.getElementById("splash-content"); + if (!splashContainer) { + console.error("Splash content container not found"); + return; + } + splashContainer.innerHTML = splashContent; + + // Wait for Webflow to be ready + window.Webflow && window.Webflow.destroy(); + window.Webflow && window.Webflow.ready(); + window.Webflow && window.Webflow.require("ix2").init(); + + // Hover effects are now handled via CSS, so we can remove the hover interaction JavaScript. + + // Initialize entrance animations (if any) + const title = document.querySelector(".huge-text"); + const text = document.querySelector(".interactive-text"); + + requestAnimationFrame(() => { + title?.classList.add("animate-in"); + setTimeout(() => { + text?.classList.add("animate-in"); + }, 500); + }); + + // Initialize gradient rotation + const gradientInner = document.querySelector(".splash-gradient-inner"); + if (gradientInner) { + let rotation = 0; + const rotateGradient = () => { + rotation += 0.1; + gradientInner.style.transform = `rotate(${rotation}deg)`; + requestAnimationFrame(rotateGradient); + }; + requestAnimationFrame(rotateGradient); + } +}
